prompt.content: Using NVDA’s 10-Ks, answer the following question: In FY2024, NVDA reported that one indirect customer represented 19% of total revenue for the fiscal year. This indirect customer purchased NVDA products through a specific direct customer for which NVDA provided additional disclosure. In FY2025, what percentage of NVDA’s total revenue was attributable to this direct customer?

rubrics.name: One indirect customer represented approximately 19% of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2024 and primarily purchased through "Customer A".

messages.content: One indirect customer represented approximately 19% of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2024 and primarily purchased through "Customer A".

rubrics.name: Sales to Customer A represented 13% of NVDA’s FY2024 total revenue.

messages.content: Sales to Customer A represented 13% of NVDA’s FY2024 total revenue.

rubrics.name: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Direct Customer A represented 12% of total revenue for FY2025.

messages.content: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Direct Customer A represented 12% of total revenue for FY2025.

rubrics.name: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer B represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025.

messages.content: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer B represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025.

rubrics.name: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer C represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025.

messages.content: NVDA’s FY2025 Form 10-K shows Customer C represented 11% of total revenue for FY2025.

rubrics.name: Customer A represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer).

messages.content: Customer A represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer).

rubrics.name: Customer C represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer).

messages.content: Customer C represented less than 10% of total revenue in FY2024 (as claimed in the answer).

rubrics.name: Customer B represented 13% of total revenues in FY2024 (as stated in the answer).

messages.content: Customer B represented 13% of total revenues in FY2024 (as stated in the answer).

rubrics.name: The answer concludes that the FY2024 "Customer A" corresponds to the FY2025 "Customer B."

messages.content: The answer concludes that the FY2024 "Customer A" corresponds to the FY2025 "Customer B."

rubrics.name: Final Answer: 11% (percentage of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2025 attributable to the direct customer identified).

messages.content: Final Answer: 11% (percentage of NVDA’s total revenue in FY2025 attributable to the direct customer identified).
